Tramontan, don't upload them all together. Upload them separately by program. One for Maya, 3DSMax, etc. Most people don't want to seed that much just to get a few videos, especially not for programs they don't use.

This one is big enough, don't make one at 140GB.

there is no need to download everything when u download any torrent
but i thougt recently, that I just couldn`t  do it... my poor upload speed just wold not alow me do this
so u win (just kidding)

You don't have to download everything, but to be recognized as a seeder you have to complete the torrent. More people will complete a torrent if it holds just what they want. Ergo, the more you split them up, the more seeders will stay on.
Guys, don't disable upload. This torrent is terribly slow without it :|
